channel.title: Looking for a Garrys mod addon
channel.description:
So some time last year before I had Garrys mod I watched a video on youtube of a guy using an addon. He was using the physics gun to position an engineer ragdoll and a dispenser. He set up the ragdoll and dispenser then hit a button somewhere in the corner of the screen that resembled a ">|" like a "next" button or something. (There was a series of buttons in the corner like stop, play, forward, etc.) Then he repositioned the ragdoll. Rinsed and repeat a few times then hit play and it played the scene out for him.
If anyone has any clue what I'm talking about this would be very helpful. I've been searching everywhere for it or something like it and I can't find it anywhere.
Hell, it might even be built into Garrys mod for all I know and if it is then I fail at finding it. lol.
Anyway, hope my descriptions makes sense...
Thanks in advance.

item.description:
it says YEAH when you engage it!

item.description:
bigfan421:

yeah, Nutsack, I’m pretty sure a “drilldo” is not gonna be able to make a scene with a ragdoll.
have you ever PLAYED gmod nutsack? the DRILLDO is a fucking SWEP (user made weapon)

have you ever PLAYED drilldo bigfan…

item.title: Looking for a Garrys mod addon
item.dc:creator: Schizophriend
item.description:
So some time last year before I had Garrys mod I watched a video on youtube of a guy using an addon.
He was using the physics gun to position an engineer ragdoll and a dispenser. He set up the ragdoll and dispenser then hit a button somewhere in the corner of the screen that resembled a “>|” like a “next” button or something. (There was a series of buttons in the corner like stop, play, forward, etc.) Then he repositioned the ragdoll. Rinsed and repeat a few times then hit play and it played the scene out for him.

If anyone has any clue what I’m talking about this would be very helpful.
I’ve been searching everywhere for it or something like it and I can’t find it anywhere.

Hell, it might even be built into Garrys mod for all I know and if it is then I fail at finding it. lol.

Anyway, hope my descriptions makes sense…

Thanks in advance.
